1009680.name: Rocket Science: Edition Upgrade
1009680.description:
This pack contains all the extras you get with the Supporter's Edition of "Rocket Science", so you can buy it to upgrade to that edition.
  • Hire Elon himself in the game. The legendary expert will bring your space center to the next level!
  • Enter a name of employee into the game so it shows up in all players' games. Players will hire you and give you tasks, such as researching new technologies, building or maintaining their space center. All that with your help!
  • Enter the name, that would be shown in the "About" section of the game. Your support is highly appreciated and will be forever in the credits of the game.
Your name must follow the submission guidelines.
(Note: Last two items does not change gameplay in any way — it only gives you the right to enter your content into the game)
